question: Which province supplied a large amount of people to the Sichuan resettlement, following years of turmoil during the Ming-Qing transition? [SEP] sentence: As a result of the massacre as well as years of turmoil during the Ming-Qing transition, the population of Sichuan fell sharply, requiring a massive resettlement of people from the neighboring Huguang Province (modern Hubei and Hunan) and other provinces during the Qing dynasty.

question: Who also began an inquiry into the question of being?
